languages.text: На вид-скрине когитатора наполовину зашифрованные записи: позывные входящих в оперативный отряд арбитров, статус и цели предстоящей операции.
The cogitator's vid-screen is showing partially encrypted records: the call signs of the Arbitrators in the task unit, the status of the upcoming operation, and its objectives.
languages.original_text: На вид-скрине когитатора наполовину зашифрованные записи: позывные входящих в оперативный отряд арбитров, статус и цели предстоящей операции.

traits.locale_text: The cogitator's vid-screen is showing partially encrypted records: the callsigns of the Arbitrators in the task unit, the status of the upcoming operation, and its objectives.
The cogitator's vid-screen is showing partially encrypted records: the callsigns of the Arbitrators in the task unit, the status of the upcoming operation, and its objectives.
The cogitator's vid-screen is showing partially encrypted records: the callsigns of the Arbitrators in the task unit, the status of the upcoming operation, and its objectives.
The cogitator's vid-screen is showing partially encrypted records: the callsigns of the Arbitrators in the task unit, the status of the upcoming operation, and its objectives.
The cogitator's vid-screen is showing partially encrypted records: the call signs of the Arbitrators in the task unit, the status of the upcoming operation, and its objectives.
The cogitator's vid-screen is showing partially encrypted records: the call signs of the Arbitrators in the task unit, the status of the upcoming operation, and its objectives.

languages.text: Der Vid-Bildschirm des Cogitators zeigt teilweise verschlüsselte Daten: die Rufzeichen aller Arbitratoren in der Einheit, den Status der kommenden Operation und ihre Einsatzziele.
languages.original_text: The cogitator's vid-screen is showing partially encrypted records: the call signs of the Arbitrators in the task unit, the status of the upcoming operation, and its objectives.

traits.locale_text: Der Vid-Bildschirm des Cogitators zeigt teilweise verschlüsselte Daten: die Rufzeichen aller Arbitratoren in der Einheit, den Status der kommenden Operation und ihre Einsatzziele.

languages.text: Des données partiellement cryptées s'affichent sur l'écran du cogitateur : les noms de code des arbitrators de l'unité, l'état de l'opération à venir et ses objectifs.
languages.original_text: The cogitator's vid-screen is showing partially encrypted records: the call signs of the Arbitrators in the task unit, the status of the upcoming operation, and its objectives.

traits.locale_text: Des données partiellement cryptées s'affichent sur l'écran du cogitateur : les noms de code des arbitrators de l'unité, l'état de l'opération à venir et ses objectifs.

languages.text: 沉思者的视讯屏幕显示着部分加密的记录，包括执行任务的法务官编号，后续行动的状态与目标等等。
languages.original_text: The cogitator's vid-screen is showing partially encrypted records: the call signs of the Arbitrators in the task unit, the status of the upcoming operation, and its objectives.

traits.locale_text: 沉思者的视讯屏幕显示着部分加密的记录，包括执行任务的法务官编号，后续行动的状态与目标等等。

languages.text: La videopantalla del cogitador muestra registros parcialmente encriptados: los códigos de los Arbitrator de la unidad, el estado de la próxima operación y sus objetivos.
languages.original_text: The cogitator's vid-screen is showing partially encrypted records: the call signs of the Arbitrators in the task unit, the status of the upcoming operation, and its objectives.

traits.locale_text: La videopantalla del cogitador muestra registros parcialmente encriptados: los códigos de los Arbitrator de la unidad, el estado de la próxima operación y sus objetivos.

languages.text: 考算機のスクリーンには部分的に暗号化された記録が表示されている。内容は作戦部隊のアービトレイターたちの呼出符号、今後の作戦の状況、そしてその目的だ。
languages.original_text: The cogitator's vid-screen is showing partially encrypted records: the call signs of the Arbitrators in the task unit, the status of the upcoming operation, and its objectives.

traits.locale_text: 考算機のスクリーンには部分的に暗号化された記録が表示されている。内容は作戦部隊のアービトレイターたちの呼出符号、今後の作戦の状況、そしてその目的だ。

languages.text: Kavramsayarın video ekranında yarı şifreli kayıtlar akıyor: Görev birliğindeki Yargıcı çağrı kodları, yaklaşan operasyonun durumu ve hedefleri.
languages.original_text: The cogitator's vid-screen is showing partially encrypted records: the call signs of the Arbitrators in the task unit, the status of the upcoming operation, and its objectives.

traits.locale_text: Kavramsayarın video ekranında yarı şifreli kayıtlar akmaktadır: Görev birliğindeki Yargıcı çağrı kodları, yaklaşan operasyonun durumu ve hedefleri.
